title: Pilot
description: An unusual comet leaves behind 4,400 people who have disappeared over the last fifty years. While authorities are investigating, some of the 4,400 are behaving strangely.

title: The New and Improved Carl Morrissey
description: Another one of The 4400 begins to show strange behavior. Carl Morrissey suddenly shows immense strength and the urge to remove criminals from Bradley Park to bring it back to its old state.

title: Becoming
description: Baldwin and Skouris deal with returnee Oliver Knox, involved in a series of murders. Jordan Collier, hotel magnate, puts himself in front as 4400 spokesman.

title: Trial by Fire
description: Someone has leaked a list of the current locations of all 4400's. When several of the returnees are bombed, Baldwin and Skouris must find out who did it.

title: White Light
description: Baldwin's son Kyle has been kidnapped by agent Lytell for interrogation. Just when Tom and Diana are making plans to take him back, Maia has a premonition about Kyle being the answer to everything.
